gov.va.isaac.gui

Class ConceptNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.isaac.gui.ConceptNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConceptLookupCallback

    public class ConceptNode
extends Object
implements ConceptLookupCallback
    ConceptNode This class handles the GUI display of concepts with many other useful tidbits, such as allowing users to enter UUIDs, SCTIDs, NIDS, or do type ahead searches. Validation lookups are background threaded.
    Author:
    Dan Armbrust

        Description copied from interface: ConceptLookupCallback
        Called when the lookup completes, and the concept object is ready.
        Specified by:
        lookupComplete in interface ConceptLookupCallback
        Parameters:
        concept - - the found concept
        submitTime - - the time that this request was submitted
        callId - - the optional arbitrary identifier passed in by the caller when the lookup began.
